allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement Position domain entity

- Position entity with factory method and validation
- PositionPnl value object for PnL calculation
- PositionStatus enum \(OPEN, CLOSED\)
- PositionExceptions for domain errors
- 10 test cases for Position domain logic

Premium diff calculation:
- premiumDiff < 0 → profit \(premium decreased\)
- premiumDiff > 0 → loss \(premium increased\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
